code: export var subTotal=function subTotal(id,price){var subTotalCost=0;var carts=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("cart"));carts.forEach(function(item){if(item.id===id){subTotalCost=item.quantitiy*price;}});return subTotalCost;};export var quantity=function quantity(id){var product=0;var carts=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("cart"));carts.forEach(function(item){if(item.id===id){product=item.quantitiy;}});return product;};export var totalCost=function totalCost(){var totalCost=0;var carts=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("cart"));carts.forEach(function(item){totalCost+=item.quantitiy*item.price;});return totalCost;};
